metadata.name: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r4pwfG1MIqk
metadata.description:
Both the fragmentation of the painting into its various components,
as well as digitization require a change, which however only affects the form and quality of the materiality of the work of art. The individual works stand on their own and yet in a context that results from the dissolution of the polarity between the analog and the digital.
metadata.method: digital collage based on photographys of paintings; JPEG
